class.name: Patch
class.summary: Minimalistic library for applying a patch (unified diff format) to some text.
class.remarks: The patch metadata must match the input text perfectly. There is no fuzzy matching.

method.name: Apply
method.summary: Apply a patch to some text and return the result.
method.param: Textual representation of the patch (unified diff format).
Text onto which the patch is applied.
method.exception: Thrown if the patch text cannot be parsed or if it is inconsistent with the input text.

method.name: Apply
method.summary: Fill a preallocated character span with the result of a patch applied to an input text.
method.param: Textual representation of the patch (unified diff format)
Text onto which the patch is applied.
Buffer for containing the patched text.
method.returns: The number of characters written to the destination buffer.
method.exception: Thrown if the patch text cannot be parsed or if it is inconsistent with the input text.
